text: Thanin Kraivichien (April 5, 1927 - February 23, 2025), , ; first name also spelled "Tanin", last name "Kraivixien" or "Kraivichian") was a Thai lawyer and politician. He was the 14th prime minister of Thailand between 1976 and 1977. and became its president in 2016. With the death of Prem Tinsulanonda in May 2019, he became the oldest living former Thai Prime Minister. Kraivichien died on February 23, 2025 in Bangkok at the age of 97.Thailand’s 14th Prime Minister dies at 97ธานินทร์ กรัยวิเชียร อดีตนายกรัฐมนตรี ถึงแก่อสัญกรรม ในวัย 97 ปี ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2025 deaths Thanin Kraivichien Thanin Kraivichien Thanin Kraivichien
title: Thanin Kraivichien
